About Me

My Introduction

I have more than six years of experience in the field of SharePoint/ Web / Desktop Application Development. Specialized in HTML5, CSS & JavaScript and other front-end development frameworks. Professional in Corporate branding, Web Development, visualization, Web animations & Windows application development. Currently working as Senior SharePoint Developer focussed on client side scripting and development.

Portfolio

Most recent works

Neumorphism in Bootstrap 4

Neumorphism design applied in bootstrap 4 components. Neumorphism is a visual style that combines background colors, shapes, gradients, highlights, and shadows to ensure graphic intense buttons and switches

View

HTML 5 Periodic Table

If you're interested in learning HTML or already know HTML but want to find out which elements are in use in HTML 5, then you might find this useful. The colorful table is laid out in a similar style to the scientific periodic table of elements.

Testimonials

My client says

It has been an absolute delight working with you. Your meticulous attention to detail and your nature of going the extra mile to attend to even the smallest of tasks is what sets you apart.

Having worked with many developers in my past projects, I can say that Paul is clearly in the top tier. He has deep knowledge in UI development and a high level of expertise in html, css, js technologies. I was very impressed with his work. He was very clear on what could and couldn't be done and communicated that clearly. He also showed a deep commitment by researching and investigating issues and coming back with answers and options.

Paul was very responsive, very easy and nice to work with and as said above I am extremely pleased with the end product. I am particularly grateful for how easy the site is for my team to manage and update since this program will evolve over time, it was critical to ensure updates were easy and quick to complete.

One of the best talented folks in my team who has always excelled when situation thrives. He always strives to deliver exceptional client service which has earned him rewards. Better Begins With You (BBWY) award the most prestigious award in EY is a testament of his great work in EY. He is technically strong and always delivered quality output which was widely acknowledged by architects.

During my short association with Paul, the main aspect i noticed was the vigor and rigor he exhibited in collecting and learning new concepts and platforms in computing. This is one thing that can take him places. I strongly recommend him for any technical activity on that regard.

Thanks to Paul for his flexibility and fantastic customer service offered throughout the project- ends up in a very high calibre site.
